roleset.name: enhancing appearance (of outdoor spaces, etc)

roles.note: Watch out for instances that refer to the plants themselves, as these are not events. Arg3 of the verb frame omitted.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, landscape.01. No VNcls.

example.name: Arg0, 1, ADJ
example.text: Discuss with Conrail - or Conrail's successor - the possibility of their landscaping the property along Girard Avenue in exchange for a pledge by the Zoo to maintain the landscaping in good order.
example.note: See, the first instance of 'landscaping' is an event, and the second one isn't.
example.arg: in exchange for a pledge by the Zoo to maintain the landscaping in good order.
